author: Cyril Gavala
bio: I'm Cyril Gavala and Iâ€˜m enthusiastic software engineer who is mainly dived in backend development in Java. In my free time I try to learn and improve my skills in web development using JavaScript. I'm adaptable and resourceful. My advantage is mathematical education, which helps me to learn things more quickly. Next I'm creative and reliable with attention to the details. I'm an Apple fan and musician. Also I like bodyweight and yoga workouts.

projects.name: Covid 19 statistics
projects.description: Simple Javascript web-scrap application mining data from https://korona.gov.sk and storing them into cloud MongoDB database. Next, NodeJS API for client-server communication and ReactJS application visualising web-scrapped data.

projects.name: Bulk e-mail sender
projects.description: ReactJS application containing integrated Gmail login and interface for sending bulk emails.

projects.name: Wedding gallery
projects.description: ReactJS photo gallery from our wedding using Dropbox API.

projects.name: Workout challenges
projects.description: NodeJS API for client-server communication and ReactJS application for saving a progress of various workout challenges and their visualisation.
